actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Ulder makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be with his shield.

actions.name: +1 Longsword
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage, and Ulder pushes the target 5 feet away from him. Ulder then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Ulder, the target provokes an opportunity attack from that creature.
